***туфелька.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:туфелька.html>ту́фелька</a> (12082)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туфля.html>ту́фля</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">túflja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туфелька.html>ту́фелька</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">túfelʹka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туфелька.html>ту́фельки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туфелька.html>ту́фельки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туфелька.html>ту́фелек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туфля.html>ту́фля</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">túflja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: (<a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:shoe.html>shoe</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:especially.html>especially</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:for.html>for</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:woman.html>women</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:child.html>children</a>
<dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru">инфузо́рия-<b><a href = vnd.unilang:туфелька.html>ту́фелька</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">infuzórija-<b>túfelʹka</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paramecium_caudatum" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Paramecium caudatum">Paramecium caudatum</a></span></div></dd></dl></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:туфелька.html>ту́фелька</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-туфель-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-к</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;cursor:help;" title="уменьшительное">уменьш.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:туфля.html>ту́фля</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:туфелька.html>Ту́фелька</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:покачиваться.html>пока́чивалась</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:палец.html>па́льце</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>её</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:нога.html>ноги</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:туго.html>ту́го</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обтянутый.html>обтя́нутой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:прозрачный.html>прозра́чным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чулок.html>чулко́м</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A2%D0%BE%D0%BB%D1%81%D1%82%D0%BE%D0%B9,_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%B9_%D0%9D%D0%B8%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Толстой, Алексей Николаевич"><a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>A</a>. Н. <a href = vnd.unilang:толстый.html>То́лстой</a></a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:любовь.html>Любо́вь</a>», <span class="example-date">1916</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>

***туфля.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:туфля.html>ту́фля</a> (3299)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Middle_Low_German" class="extiw" title="w:Middle Low German"><a href = vnd.unilang:middle.html>Middle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:low.html>Low</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="gml">tuffele</i> (<a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Low_German" class="extiw" title="w:Low German"><a href = vnd.unilang:low.html>Low</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="nds">Tuffel</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:shoe.html>shoe</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>), <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> older <i class="Latn mention" lang="gml">pantuffel</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr">pantoufle</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:slipper.html>slipper</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norwegian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Norwegian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:norwegian.html>Norwegian</a></a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Danish language"><a href = vnd.unilang:danish.html>Danish</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="da">tøffel</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swedish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Swedish language"><a href = vnd.unilang:swedish.html>Swedish</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="sv">toffel</i> title="w:Latvian language"><a href = vnd.unilang:latvian.html>Latvian</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="lv">tupele</i>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>ту́ф<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ля.html>ля</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 2*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-туфл-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-я</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<p><a href = vnd.unilang:inherit.html>Inherited</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*tъxlъ</i> (<a href = vnd.unilang:as.html>as</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dialectal.html>dialectal</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">то́хлый</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tóxlyj</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>), <a href = vnd.unilang:which.html>which</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:may.html>may</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:represent.html>represent</a> <a href = lang="ru">ту́хнуть</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">túxnutʹ</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span <p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тухлый.html>ту́хлый</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">túxlyj</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)тухле́е</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)тухле́й</b>)

<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:musty.html>musty</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:stale.html>stale</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:stagnant.html>stagnant</a> <span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:water.html>water</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:air.html>air</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Synonyms"><a href = vnd.unilang:synonym.html>Synonyms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content qualifier-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:stale.html>stale</a></span><span class="ib-brac qualifier-brac">)</span><span class="ib-colon sense-qualifier-colon">:</span> <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:затхлый.html>за́тхлый</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">zátxlyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:несвежий.html>несве́жий</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">nesvéžij</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">ту́хнуть</span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">túxnutʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:потухнуть.html>поту́хнуть</a></span> <span class="gender"><abbr title="perfective aspect"><a href = vnd.unilang:pf.html>pf</a></abbr></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">potúxnutʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b>ту́х<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>лый</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:относительный.html>относи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1a/<a href = vnd.unilang:c.html>c</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>ту́хлее, ту́хлей.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-тух-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-л</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="переносное значение">перен.</span>, <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="жаргонизм(ы)">жарг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:плохой.html>плохо́й</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неприятный.html>неприя́тный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:нездоровый.html>нездоро́вый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:либо.html>ли́бо</a> безнадёжный <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>И</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:если.html>е́сли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:это.html>э́тому</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:случайный.html>случа́йному</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:удаваться.html>удаётся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:уже.html>уже́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неделя.html>неде́лю</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ловко.html>ло́вко</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:избегать.html>избега́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:весь.html>всех</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:милицейский.html>милице́йских</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ловушка.html>лову́шек</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:значить.html>зна́чит</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:дело.html>дело</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тухлый.html>ту́хлое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:значить.html>зна́чит</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:дело.html>дело</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:плохо.html>плохо</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>Петр Галицкий, «<a href = vnd.unilang:опасный.html>Опа́сная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:коллекция.html>колле́кция</a>», <span class="example-date">2000</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; ***тухлятина.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:тухлятина.html>тухля́тина</a> (30453)</h1><br><h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b>тух<span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ля.html>ля́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ти.html>ти</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a></b>

***туча.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ча</a> (2394)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_East_Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Old East Slavic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="orv-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tuča</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:ultimately.html>ultimately</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Indo-European_language" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Indo-European language">Proto-Indo-European</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="ine-pro">*tenk-</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:contract.html>contract</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:compare.html>Compare</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavic.html>Slavic</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Church_Slavonic" class="extiw" title="w:Old Church Slavonic"><a href = vnd.unilang:old.html>Old</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:church.html>Church</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:slavonic.html>Slavonic</a></a></span> <i class="Cyrs mention" lang="cu">тѫча</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ukrainian_language" class="extiw" title="w:Ukrainian language">Ukrainian</a></span> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="uk"><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ча</a></i> href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Polish_language" class="extiw" title="w:Polish language"><a href = vnd.unilang:polish.html>Polish</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="pl">tęcza</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:and.html>and</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> Non-Slavic <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gothic_language" class="extiw" title="w:Gothic language"><a href = vnd.unilang:gothic.html>Gothic</a></a></span> <i class="Goth mention" lang="got">𐌸𐌴𐌹𐍈𐍉𐌽</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="got-Latn" class="mention-tr tr </p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ча</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">túča</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́чи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́чи</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ч</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:meteorology.html>meteorology</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:rain.html>rain</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cloud.html>cloud</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:dark.html>dark</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:heavy.html>heavy</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cloud.html>cloud</a>

vnd.unilang:прогрессирующий.html>прогресси́рующая</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дистрофия.html>дистрофи́я</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ч</a></b>. <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>они́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ведь.html>ведь</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>са́мого</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:начать.html>нача́ла</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:показаться.html>показа́лись</a> ви́ктору скоре́е <a href = vnd.unilang:декорация.html>декора́цией</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:чем.html>чем</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:предвестник.html>предве́стниками</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ливень.html>ли́вня</a>. <b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́чи</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:быть.html>бы́ли</a> импоте́нтны, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> импоте́нтные <b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́чи</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:зваться.html>зову́тся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:облако.html>облака́ми</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:ветер.html>ве́тер</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>их</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:растаскивать.html>раста́скивает</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:небо.html>не́бу</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:до.html>до</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:полный.html>по́лного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:исчезновение.html>исчезнове́ния</a>.</span><dl><dd><i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><b>Túči</b> postepénno prevraščálisʹ <a href = vnd.unilang:v.html>v</a> oblaká íli proisxodíl kakój-to drugój trudnoobʺjasnímyj dlja neposvjaščónnyx klimatíčeskij fenómen. Progressírujuščaja/progrɛssírujuščaja distrofíja <b>tuč</b>. Oní vedʹ <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> sámovo načála pokazálisʹ Víktoru skoréje dekorácijej, čem predvéstnikami lívnja. <b>Túči</b> býli impoténtny, <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> impoténtnyje/impotɛ́ntnyje <b>túči</b> zovútsja oblakámi, <a href = vnd.unilang:i.html>i</a> véter ix obýčno rastáskivajet <a href = vnd.unilang:po.html>po</a> nébu <a href = vnd.unilang:do.html>do</a> pólnovo isčeznovénija.</i></dd><dd><span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:storm.html>storm</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cloud.html>clouds</a></b> <a href = vnd.unilang:gradually.html>gradually</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:turn.html>turned</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:into.html>into</a> [<a href = vnd.unilang:ordinary.html>ordinary</a>] <a href = vnd.unilang:cloud.html>clouds</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:some.html>some</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:other.html>other</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:climatic.html>climatic</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:phenomenon.html>phenomenon</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:take.html>took</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:place.html>place</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:inexplicable.html>inexplicable</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> uninitiated. <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>A</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:progressive.html>progressive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:dystrophy.html>dystrophy</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <b><a href = <dl><dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:небо.html>не́бо</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:затянутый.html>затя́нуто</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́чами</a></b>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">Nébo zatjanuto <b>túčami</b>.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sky.html>sky</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:is.html>is</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:overcast.html>overcast</a>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:небо.html>не́бе</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:собираться.html>собира́ются</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́чи</a></b>.</i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:na.html>Na</a> nébe sobirájutsja <b>túči</b>.</i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:rain.html>Rain</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cloud.html>clouds</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:are.html>are</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:gather.html>gathering</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:in.html>in</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sky.html>sky</a>.</span></div></dd>
<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:грозовой.html>грозова́я</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ча</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">grozovája <b>túča</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:storm.html>storm</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:cloud.html>cloud</a></span></div></dd>

<dd><div class="h-usage-example"><i class="Cyrl mention e-example" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:как.html>как</a> <b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ча</a></b></i> ― <i lang="ru-Latn" class="e-transliteration tr Latn">kak <b>túča</b></i> ― <span class="e-translation"><a href = vnd.unilang:gloomy.html>gloomy</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:morose.html>morose</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:about.html>about</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:person.html>person</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></span></div></dd></dl></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>ту́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ча</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 4a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-туч-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li>—</li>

***тучка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:тучка.html>ту́чка</a> (15575)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ча</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">túča</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тучка.html>ту́чка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">túčka</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тучка.html>ту́чки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тучка.html>ту́чки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тучка.html>ту́чек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ча</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">túča</span>, <span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:cloud.html>cloud</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:cloudlet.html>cloudlet</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:rain.html>rain</a>) <a href = vnd.unilang:cloud.html>cloud</a></li></ol>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Related_terms"><a href = vnd.unilang:related.html>Related</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:term.html>terms</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ч</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-туч-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-к</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>

***тучный.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:тучный.html>ту́чный</a> (13110)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proto-Slavic" class="extiw" title="w:Proto-Slavic">Proto-Slavic</a></span> <i class="Latinx mention" lang="sla-pro">*tučьnъ</i>. <a href = vnd.unilang:equivalent.html>Equivalent</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тук.html>тук</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tuk</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ный</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-nyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Adjective"><a href = vnd.unilang:adjective.html>Adjective</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тучный.html>ту́чный</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">túčnyj</span>) (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:comparative.html>comparative</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)тучне́е</b> <i><a href = vnd.unilang:or.html>or</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru">(<a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a>)тучне́й</b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:fat.html>fat</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:obese.html>obese</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:corpulent.html>corpulent</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:extremely.html>extremely</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:overweight.html>overweight</a>)</li></ol>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:туча.html>ту́ч</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ный</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:прилагательное.html>Прилага́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:качественный.html>ка́чественное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 1*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>/<a href = vnd.unilang:c.html>c</a>'. <a href = vnd.unilang:сравнительный.html>Сравни́тельная</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:степень.html>сте́пень</a> — <i>тучне́е, тучне́й.</i>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-тучн-</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ый</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:упитанный.html>упи́танный</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:толстый.html>то́лстый</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:жирный.html>жи́рный</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́ке</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:животный.html>живо́тном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т. д.) <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:налитый.html>налитой</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:полновесный.html>полнове́сный</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:зерно.html>зерне́</a>); <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:налившийся.html>нали́вшимся</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:полновесный.html>полнове́сным</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:зерно.html>зерно́м</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:сочный.html>со́чный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:густой.html>густо́й</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трава.html>траве́</a>); <a href = vnd.unilang:с.html>с</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сочный.html>со́чной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:густой.html>густо́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:трава.html>траво́й</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><a href = vnd.unilang:плодородный.html>плодоро́дный</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:о.html>о</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:земля.html>земле́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> т. п.) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:тоже.html>То́же</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>мне</a>, <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тучный.html>ту́чные</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>го́ды</a>: всего-то <a href = vnd.unilang:около.html>о́коло</a> 7,7 млрд недополученных <a href = vnd.unilang:доллар.html>до́лларов</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> <small></small></span></i><small>(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:библиотека.html>библиоте́ки</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Google_%D0%9A%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%B3%D0%B8" class="extiw" title="w:Google Книги"><a href = vnd.unilang:google.html>Google</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:книга.html>Кни́ги</a></a>)<i></i></small></span></span></span></li></ol>
<h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:толстый.html>то́лстый</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:жирный.html>жи́рный</a>, корпулентный</li>
</ol>
</body>

***туша.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>туша</a> (27663)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>ту́ша</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">túša</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>ту́ши</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>ту́ши</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:туш.html>туш</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:carcass.html>carcass</a></li>
<li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a><span class="ib-comma">,</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:derogatory.html>derogatory</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:hulk.html>hulk</a>; <a href = vnd.unilang:fat.html>fat</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:man.html>man</a>'<a href = vnd.unilang:s.html>s</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:body.html>body</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:bulk.html>bulk</a></li></ol>

<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>

<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>туша́</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">tušá</span>)

<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:present.html>present</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:adverbial.html>adverbial</a> imperfective <a href = vnd.unilang:participle.html>participle</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>туши́ть</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tušítʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>ту́</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:ша.html>ша</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 4a  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:ball.html>--</a></b>.
</p>

Леонов</a><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>На</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:привал.html>прива́ле</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>он</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свое́й</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>ту́шей</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:придавить.html>придави́л</a> Скотта, <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> Скотт <a href = vnd.unilang:задыхаться.html>задыха́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тяжесть.html>тя́жести</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тучный.html>ту́чного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тело.html>тела</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%91%D0%B5%D0%BB%D1%8F%D0%B5%D0%B2,_%D0%90%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BA%D1%81%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80_%D0%A0%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Беляев, Александр Романович"><a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Беляев</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:чудесный.html>Чуде́сное</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:очко.html>око</a>», <span class="example-date">1935</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:управлять.html>Управля́ющий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:надвинуться.html>надви́нулся</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>него́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свое́й</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:внушительный.html>внуши́тельной</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>ту́шей</a></span>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%A5%D0%B0%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%8F,_%D0%95%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0_%D0%92%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%BD%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Хаецкая, Елена Владимировна">Е. <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>В</a>. ***тушеваться.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:тушеваться.html>тушева́ться</a> (28988)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">тушева́ть</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tuševátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ся</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-sja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Verb"><a href = vnd.unilang:verb.html>Verb</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушеваться.html>тушева́ться</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">tuševátʹsja</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="imperfective aspect">impf</abbr></span> (<i>perfective</i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стушеваться.html>стушева́ться</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:colloquial.html>colloquial</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:shy.html>shy</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:be.html>be</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:embarrassed.html>embarrassed</a></li>
<li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:passive.html>passive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">тушева́ть</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tuševátʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:тушеваться.html>тушева́ться</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, непереходный,  <a href = vnd.unilang:возвратный.html>возвра́тный</a>,  <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 2a.      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующий</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́л</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:стушеваться.html>стушева́ться</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-тушева-</b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>; постфикс: <b>-ся</b> <sup> | Тихонов, 1996 | </sup>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="разговорное">разг.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:робеть.html>робе́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:смущаться.html>смуща́ться</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:приходить.html>приходи́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:замешательство.html>замеша́тельство</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li>страд. <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> тушевать <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:тушение.html>туше́ние</a> (26048)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<ol><li><i>действ. прич. прош. вр.</i> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>туши́ть</a> <span class="example-fullblock example-absent-block"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><span class="example-absent" style="color:darkorange"><a href = vnd.unilang:отсутствовать.html>Отсу́тствует</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пример.html>приме́р</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:употребление.html>употребле́ния</a> (см. <span class="example-recommendations" style="color:darkorange; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; -moz-text-decoration-color: darkorange; text-decoration-color: darkorange;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>рекомендации</a></span>).</span> <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><span class="citation-source"> </span></i></span></span></span></li>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>ту</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:шить.html>ши́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4c(4).      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́лы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — <a href = vnd.unilang:затушить.html>затуши́ть</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:потушить.html>потуши́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-туш-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>.
</p>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>

<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>ту</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span><a href = vnd.unilang:шить.html>ши́ть</a></b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>Глаго́л</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:несовершенный.html>несоверше́нный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>вид</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:переходный.html>перехо́дный</a>,    <a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> спряжения <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка — 4c(4).      <a href = vnd.unilang:соответствующий.html>Соотве́тствующие</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:глагол.html>глаго́лы</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:совершённый.html>совершенного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вид.html>ви́да</a> — стушить, <a href = vnd.unilang:потушить.html>потуши́ть</a>.
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-туш-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:соорудить.html>-и</a></b>; глагольное <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b>-ть</b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><a href = vnd.unilang:варить.html>вари́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:медленный.html>ме́дленном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:огонь.html>огне́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:закрытый.html>закры́той</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:посуда.html>посу́де</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:мясо.html>мя́со</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:овощ.html>о́вощи</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>их</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:собственный.html>со́бственном</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сок.html>соку</a>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:закрыть.html>Закры́ть</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:крышка.html>кры́шкой</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>туши́ть</a></span> <a href = vnd.unilang:около.html>о́коло</a> 30 <a href = vnd.unilang:минута.html>минут</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:или.html>или</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:пока.html>пока́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:цыпленок.html>цыплёнок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:не.html>не</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:стать.html>ста́нет</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:мягкий.html>мя́гким</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i>«<a href = vnd.unilang:рецепт.html>Реце́пты</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>национа́льных</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:кухня.html>ку́хонь</a>: <a href = vnd.unilang:франция.html>Франция</a>», <span class="example-date">2005</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; ***тушка.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шка</a> (24563)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_1"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 1</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>ту́ша</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">túša</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-ка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ka</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
</p>
<div class="thumb tright"><div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/57/Chickens_in_market.jpg/220px-Chickens_in_market.jpg" decoding="async" width="220" height="180" class="thumbimage" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/57/Chickens_in_market.jpg/330px-Chickens_in_market.jpg 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/57/Chickens_in_market.jpg/440px-Chickens_in_market.jpg 2x" data-file-width="2860" data-file-height="2336" />  <div class="thumbcaption"><div class="magnify"></div><a href = vnd.unilang:куриный.html>Кури́ные</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шки</a></div></div></div>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">túška</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="form-of-definition use-with-mention"><a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>Diminutive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <span class="form-of-definition-link"><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>ту́ша</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">túša</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></span></span>: <a href = vnd.unilang:trunk.html>trunk</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:body.html>body</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:carcass.html>carcass</a> <span class="gloss-brac">(</span><span class="gloss-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:body.html>body</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:of.html>of</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:recently.html>recently</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:kill.html>killed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:animal.html>animal</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:typically.html>typically</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:small.html>small</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:one.html>one</a></span><span class="gloss-brac">)</span></li>

<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a> 2</span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>From</a> <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soviet_Union_military_aircraft_designation_systemsDesign_Office_Prefixes" class="extiw" title="w:Soviet Union military aircraft designation systems"><a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>Ту</a></a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn"><a href = vnd.unilang:tu.html>Tu</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-шка</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-ška</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:base.html>based</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:on.html>on</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>the</a> Tupolev <a href = vnd.unilang:design.html>design</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:office.html>office</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:prefix.html>prefix</a>.
</p>
<hr><h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun_2"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h4>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шка</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">túška</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шки</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шек</a></b>)
</p>
<ol><li><span class="ib-brac">(</span><span class="ib-content"><a href = vnd.unilang:aviation.html>aviation</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:slang.html>slang</a><span class="ib-comma">,</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:diminutive.html>diminutive</a></span><span class="ib-brac">)</span> <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tupolev" class="extiw" title="w:Tupolev">Tupolev</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:aircraft.html>aircraft</a></li></ol>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:туш.html>ту́ш</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-туш-</b>; суффикс: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:смекалка.html>-к</a></b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>.
</p>
<hr><hr><h4><span id=".D0.97.D0.BD.D0.B0.D1.87.D0.B5.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.B5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Значение"><a href = vnd.unilang:значение.html>Значе́ние</a></span></h4>
<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="уменьшительное">уменьш.</span>-<span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="ласкательное"><a href = vnd.unilang:ласка.html>ла́ск</a>.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:к.html>к</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тушить.html>туша</a>; освежёванное <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> выпотрошенное <a href = vnd.unilang:тело.html>тело</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:убитый.html>уби́того</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:животный.html>живо́тного</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:небольшой.html>небольшо́го</a>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen"><a href = vnd.unilang:повсюду.html>Повсю́ду</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:дымить.html>дыми́ли</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:костер.html>костры́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:на.html>на</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:который.html>кото́рых</a> запекали <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:жарить.html>жа́рили</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:куриный.html>кури́ные</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; font-weight: bold;"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушка.html>ту́шки</a></span>, <a href = vnd.unilang:наспех.html>на́спех</a> ощипанные, <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>а</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:оттого.html>оттого́</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:вонять.html>воня́ло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:воздух.html>воздухе</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:паленый.html>палёной</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:плоть.html>пло́тью</a>. <span class="example-details" style="font-size:smaller;"> <i><a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9B%D0%B8%D0%BF%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B2,_%D0%94%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%B9_%D0%9C%D0%B8%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B9%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%87" class="extiw" title="w:Липскеров, Дмитрий Михайлович">Д. М. Липскеров</a>, «<a href = vnd.unilang:сорок.html>Сорок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:год.html>лет</a> Чанчжоэ», <span class="example-date">1996</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:он.html>г</a>.<span class="citation-source"> <span class="nkrja-source" style="font-size: x-small; font-style: italic;">(<a href = vnd.unilang:цитата.html>цита́та</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:из.html>из</a> <a href="https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%86%D0%B8%D0%BE%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%8C%D0%BD%D1%8B%D0%B9_%D0%BA%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BF%D1%83%D1%81_%D1%80%D1%83%D1%81%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D1%8F%D0%B7%D1%8B%D0%BA%D0%B0" class="extiw" title="w:Национальный корпус русского языка"><a href = vnd.unilang:национальный.html>Национа́льного</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:корпус.html>корпуса</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:русский.html>ру́сского</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:язык.html>языка́</a></a>, см. <a href = vnd.unilang:список.html>Спи́сок</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:литература.html>литерату́ры</a>)</span></span></i></span></span></span></li>
<li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="ироничное">ирон.</span> <a href = vnd.unilang:тело.html>тело</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:человек.html>челове́ка</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:обычно.html>обы́чно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:толстый.html>то́лстое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неуклюжий.html>неуклю́жее</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неповоротливый.html>неповоро́тливое</a>) <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">«<a href = vnd.unilang:самый.html>Са́мый</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:успешный.html>успе́шный</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:российский.html>российский</a> шоу-проект», <a href = vnd.unilang:в.html>в</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:сущность.html>су́щности</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:говорить.html>говоря́</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:маленький.html>мало</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:чем.html>чем</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:отличаться.html>отлича́ется</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:от.html>от</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:российский.html>росси́йских</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:же.html>же</a> порнофильмов, <a href = vnd.unilang:где.html>где</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:девочка.html>де́вочки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:старательный.html>стара́тельно</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:и.html>и</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:неумело.html>неуме́ло</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:демонстрировать.html>демонстри́руют</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:свое.html>свои́</a> <span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; <h4><span id=".D0.A1.D0.B8.D0.BD.D0.BE.D0.BD.D0.B8.D0.BC.D1.8B"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Синонимы"><a href = vnd.unilang:синоним.html>Сино́нимы</a></span></h4>

<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0_2"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства_2"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:туш.html>ту́ш</a><span class="hyph" style="color:lightgreen;">-</span>ка</b>
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:существительное.html>Существи́тельное</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:неодушевленный.html>неодушевлённое</a>, <a href = vnd.unilang:женский.html>же́нский</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:род.html>род</a>, 1-е <a href = vnd.unilang:see.html>склонение</a> (<a href = vnd.unilang:тип.html>тип</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:склонение.html>склоне́ния</a> 3*<a href = vnd.unilang:a.html>a</a>  <a href = vnd.unilang:по.html>по</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:классификация.html>классифика́ции</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. <a href = vnd.unilang:а.html>А</a>. Зализняка).
</p><p><a href = vnd.unilang:корень.html>Ко́рень</a>: <b>-ту-</b>; суффикс: <b>-шк</b>; <a href = vnd.unilang:окончание.html>оконча́ние</a>: <b><a href = vnd.unilang:понимать.html>-а</a></b>.
</p>

<ol><li><span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="жаргонизм(ы)">жарг.</span> <span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="уменьшительное">уменьш.</span>-<span style="font-style: italic;background-color:CCFFFF;cursor:help;" title="ласкательное"><a href = vnd.unilang:ласка.html>ла́ск</a>.</span> самолёт <a href = vnd.unilang:марка.html>ма́рки</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:тот.html>Ту</a> <span class="example-fullblock"> |  <span class="example-block" style="color:darkgreen">Самолёт, <a href = vnd.unilang:потертый.html>потёртая</a> «<span class="example-select" style="background-color: EDF0FF; ***тушь.html
<head> <meta charset='utf-8'> </head> <body><h1> <a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>тушь</a> (7990)</h1><br><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Etymology"><a href = vnd.unilang:etymology.html>Etymology</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><a href = vnd.unilang:borrow.html>Borrowed</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/German_language" class="extiw" title="w:German language"><a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="de">Tusche</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <span class="etyl"><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/French_language" class="extiw" title="w:French language"><a href = vnd.unilang:french.html>French</a></a></span> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr">touche</i>, <a href = vnd.unilang:from.html>from</a> <i class="Latn mention" lang="fr"><a href = vnd.unilang:toucher.html>toucher</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">“</span><span class="mention-gloss"><a href = vnd.unilang:to.html>to</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:touch.html>touch</a></span><span class="mention-gloss-double-quote">”</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>. <a href = vnd.unilang:the.html>The</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:sense.html>sense</a> “mascara” <a href = vnd.unilang:also.html>also</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:perhaps.html>perhaps</a> follows <a href = vnd.unilang:german.html>German</a> <i class="Latn mention" lang="de">Wimperntusche</i>.
</p>
<hr><h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Noun"><a href = vnd.unilang:noun.html>Noun</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"></span></h3>
<p><strong class="Cyrl headword" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>тушь</a></strong> • (<span lang="ru-Latn" class="headword-tr manual-tr tr Latn" dir="ltr">tušʹ</span>) <span class="gender"><abbr title="feminine gender">f</abbr> <abbr title="inanimate">inan</abbr></span> (<i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>ту́ши</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:nominative.html>nominative</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>ту́ши</a></b>, <i><a href = vnd.unilang:genitive.html>genitive</a> <a href = vnd.unilang:plural.html>plural</a></i> <b class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>ту́шей</a></b>)
</p>

<li><a href = vnd.unilang:mascara.html>mascara</a></li></ol>

<ul><li><span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">затушёвывать</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">zatušóvyvatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru">затушевать</span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">zatuševatʹ</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>, <span class="Cyrl" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:стушеваться.html>стушева́ться</a></span> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="tr Latn">stuševátʹsja</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span></li></ul>
<h3><span id=".D0.9C.D0.BE.D1.80.D1.84.D0.BE.D0.BB.D0.BE.D0.B3.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D0.B8_.D1.81.D0.B8.D0.BD.D1.82.D0.B0.D0.BA.D1.81.D0.B8.D1.87.D0.B5.D1.81.D0.BA.D0.B8.D0.B5_.D1.81.D0.B2.D0.BE.D0.B9.D1.81.D1.82.D0.B2.D0.B0"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Морфологические_и_синтаксические_свойства"></span></h3>
<p><b><a href = vnd.unilang:тушь.html>тушь</a></b>

<p><i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru"><a href = vnd.unilang:тщательный.html>тща́тельный</a></i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">tščátelʹnyj</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span> + |  <i class="Cyrl mention" lang="ru">-о</i> <span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">(</span><span lang="ru-Latn" class="mention-tr tr Latn">-o</span><span class="mention-gloss-paren annotation-paren">)</span>
